hello.subtitle: I am Faraaz Biyabani, a computer engineering student at the University of Mumbai. I am always curious about technology and love writing code to create purposeful things.

projects.title: DCroSS
projects.description: Disaster Crowd-sourcing and Support System (DCroSS) is a project built for disaster managers to collect data during time critical disaster situations. It placed third in IITB's e-Yantra Innovation Challenge 2020-21. It uses web scraping and chatbots to aggregate data from various sources and provides a dashboard to consume this data.

projects.title: Find-a-CoWIN
projects.description: Find-a-CoWIN is a slot finder for MoHFW's (India) CoWIN vaccination platform. It uses the CoWIN Public API to get the vaccination slots data for any district in any state across India. It has extensive filtering options, light or dark themes and the ability to star or bookmark vaccination centers.

projects.title: Feedbacker
projects.description: Feedbacker is a tool that can be used to collect, manage and display product feedbacks on landing pages. Feedbacks or reviews can be collected using a form and embedded into other sites using an iframe, and a dashboard can be used to control which feedbacks have to be displayed.

projects.title: Markerr
projects.description: Markerr is a collaborative webpage annotation tool which can be used to comment on live websites. HTML elements can be tagged and text can be highlighted to discuss visual bugs or provide feedback. Markerr can eliminate feedback scattered across screenshots and multiple platforms.
